briefTitle: A Comprehensive Oncology Rehabilitation and Exercise (CORE) Program Among Breast Cancer Survivors
officialTitle: The Feasibility and Acceptability of a Comprehensive Oncology Rehabilitation and Exercise (CORE) Program Among Breast Cancer Survivors
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Percentage of participants who complete in-clinic assessment
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Newly diagnosed stage I-III breast cancer survivors who have plans to undergo breast cancer surgery

Exclusion Criteria:

* Stage I-III breast cancer survivors who had received neoadjuvant chemotherapy
